mapper.insert: INSERT INTO userinfo( province, city, district, contact_confirmed_cases, coresident, date, health, health_code, living_conditions, name, number, temperature, through_risk_areas, vaccine) VALUES ( #{province}, #{city}, #{district}, #{contactConfirmedCases}, #{coresident}, #{date}, #{health}, #{healthCode}, #{livingConditions}, #{name}, #{number}, #{temperature}, #{through_risk_areas}, #{vaccine})
